approve.description: Allows a spender to withdraw from the caller’s account up to the amount specified.

transfer.description: Transfers tokens directly from the caller’s address to another address.

transferFrom.description: Transfers tokens from one address to another on behalf of the sender.

acceptOwnership.description: Accepts ownership of the contract from the nominated owner.

anySynthOrSNXRateIsInvalid.description: Checks if any synth or SNX rate is invalid.

availableCurrencyKeys.description: Returns the list of available currency keys.

availableSynthCount.description: Returns the count of available synths.

availableSynths.description: Returns the address of the available synth at a given index.

balanceOf.description: Returns the balance of a given account.

burnSynths.description: Burns synths from the caller’s account.

burnSynthsOnBehalf.description: Burns synths from another account on behalf of the caller.

burnSynthsToTarget.description: Burns synths to reach the target amount.

burnSynthsToTargetOnBehalf.description: Burns synths to target amount on behalf of another account.

collateral.description: Returns the collateral for a given account.

collateralisationRatio.description: Returns the collateralisation ratio for a given issuer.

debtBalanceOf.description: Returns the debt balance of a given account in a specific currency.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimals used by the token.

emitAtomicSynthExchange.description: Emits an event for an atomic synth exchange.

emitExchangeRebate.description: Emits an event for an exchange rebate.

emitExchangeReclaim.description: Emits an event for an exchange reclaim.

emitExchangeTracking.description: Emits an event for exchange tracking.

emitSynthExchange.description: Emits an event for a synth exchange.

exchange.description: Exchanges a specified amount of one currency for another.

exchangeAtomically.description: Exchanges a specified amount of one currency for another atomically.

exchangeOnBehalf.description: Exchanges a specified amount of one currency for another on behalf of a given address.

exchangeOnBehalfWithTracking.description: Exchanges a specified amount of one currency for another on behalf of a given address with tracking.

exchangeWithTracking.description: Exchanges a specified amount of one currency for another with tracking.

exchangeWithTrackingForInitiator.description: Exchanges a specified amount of one currency for another with tracking for the initiator.

exchangeWithVirtual.description: Exchanges a specified amount of one currency for another with virtual synths.

issueMaxSynths.description: Issues the maximum amount of synths.

issueMaxSynthsOnBehalf.description: Issues the maximum amount of synths on behalf of another account.

issueSynths.description: Issues a specified amount of synths.

issueSynthsOnBehalf.description: Issues a specified amount of synths on behalf of another account.

liquidateDelinquentAccountEscrowIndex.description: Liquidates a delinquent account based on escrow index.

liquidateSelf.description: Allows the caller to liquidate their own account.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

nominatedOwner.description: Returns the address of the nominated owner.

nominateNewOwner.description: Nominate a new owner for the contract.

owner.description: Returns the address of the contract owner.

proxy.description: Returns the address of the proxy contract.

remainingIssuableSynths.description: Returns the remaining issuable synths for an account.

resolver.description: Returns the address of the address resolver contract.

resolverAddressesRequired.description: Returns the list of addresses required by the resolver.

revokeAllEscrow.description: Revokes all escrow for a given account.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

synths.description: Returns the address of a synth by its currency key.

synthsByAddress.description: Returns the currency key of a synth by its address.

tokenState.description: Returns the address of the token state contract.

totalIssuedSynths.description: Returns the total amount of issued synths for a given currency.

totalIssuedSynthsExcludeOtherCollateral.description: Returns the total amount of issued synths excluding other collateral.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of the token.

transferAllFunds.description: Transfers all funds from the contract.

transferOwnershipToAddress.description: Transfers ownership to a specified address.
